unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. We at Tata Consultancy Services value fresh perspectives. Our team will be at IIT Delhi on 20/07/2024. We'll be looking for candidates with strong analytical skills for roles in Bengaluru. Apply before 10/07/2024, 17:00 hrs. Rs. 5 Lakh CTC and more available. See you there at 09:00 hrs!
